abstract: Nearly half of iPhone users changed carriers in order to use the device, according to a survey.
snippet: Nearly half of iPhone users changed carriers in order to use the device, according to a survey.
lead_paragraph: Nearly half of iPhone users changed carriers in order to use the device, according to a survey of 460 iPhone users by Rubicon Consulting, a technology consulting firm. The survey found that the average iPhone user was paying $19 more in phone bills than before.

headline.main: IPhone’s Hold on Users Not Exclusive
headline.print_headline: IPhone’s Hold on Users Not Exclusive
